metadata.name: Digital Mirage Watcher
metadata.description:
In an era of information noise and distortions, the pursuit of truth becomes a rare treasure. The Digital Mirage Watcher tirelessly delves through the digital veil, aiming to unveil the light of truth hidden within. In a world where reality is elusive, the call to seek truth and unlock the potential of knowledge is embraced. May the Digital Mirage Watcher guide us on our journey, leading us to truth and enlightenment.

Bio: Atmonez is an art director and digital artist specializing in motion graphics. He began his professional career over 10 years ago and has earned recognition in the industry. He has worked with such companies as Razer, Adidas, Hansa and others.
He actively showcases his work at exhibitions worldwide, including cities such as Tokyo, Berlin, Liverpool, New York, Miami, Los Angeles, and more. His projects have been recognized and published in various magazines dedicated to computer graphics, cyberpunk, and art.
